content.rendered:
QUALITY POLICY

WE ARE COMMITTED TO IMPARTING QUALITY TECHNICAL EDUCATION AND TRAINING, IN PURSUIT OF BECOMING THE GLOBAL TECHNICAL INSTITUTION THROUGH CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT IN ITS SCHOLASTIC ABILITY AND EFFECTIVENESS THROUGH QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM. THE QUALITY POLICY IS COMMUNICATED AND UNDERSTOOD BY ALL STAKEHOLDERS, EMPLOYEES, STUDENTS AND ALL THOSE WHO ARE CONNECTED WITH THE INSTITUTE AND IS REVIEWS FOR PERSISTENCE AND PERSEVERANCE

CONTACT

Building no: 238/878D, 3rd Floor,Ravi’s Arcade ,   Kollam-691013

91 70342 35500 | 91 99463 57583

info@irez.in

BROCHURES

View our 2017 financial prospectus brochure for an easy to read guide on all of the services offer.

DOWNLOAD BROCHURES
Previous
Next
